HDF 2.0 Product Management Demo Environment - Data In Motion Reference App

For the use case details, check out the HDF 2.0 Data in Motion Reference App

The below links show case the capabilities of the HDF 2.0 Platform

Link Description
Deploy the Storm Topology Deploys the Storm Topology to the Cluster
Ambari for HDF 2.0 The provisioning, management and montioring tool for the HDF 2.0 Platform
Nifi Data Flow The Nifi and Minifi flow that captures truck events from Telemetry Devices, parses, transforms and routes them to the Stream Proessing Cluster
Stream Processing Cluster The Stream Processing cluster that performs joins, aggregrations over windows, splits and serves up insights to real-time app
Truck Monitoring Application A Real-time Truck Monitoring application powered by the HDF Platform

The specific components in this architecture are the following:

  • Minifi - Collect Events from the Edge. The edge here represents collecting events from the different sensors on the truck
  • Nifi - Performs site to site data movement, intelligent data routing, transformations, enrichment, and delivers the streams to the stream processing engine.
  • Kafka - Scalable Event Broker that acts as the distributed storage Substrate for the Stream Processing engine
  • Storm - Streaming analytics engine used to build a stream application demonstrating joining streams, windoweed aggreation, fast real-tile model scoring, serving requests to Dashboard
  • HBase - Store the Time-Series Trucking Events for Fast Access
